basics.name: Renée J. Miller
basics.label: Canada Excellence Research Chair in Data Intelligence
basics.summary: Professor and researcher specializing in data management, data integration, metadata management, data quality, and big data curation. Currently serving as the Canada Excellence Research Chair (CERC) in Data Intelligence at the University of Waterloo.

work.name: University of Waterloo
work.position: Professor & Canada Excellence Research Chair in Data Intelligence

highlights: Bell Canada Chair of Information Systems (2006-2016)

awards.title: Fellow of AAAS
awards.awarder: American Association for the Advancement of Science

awards.title: Alonzo Church Award for Outstanding Contributions to Logic
awards.summary: Recognized for contributions to logical foundations for data exchange.

awards.title: CS Canada Lifetime Achievement Award in Computer Science
awards.summary: Recognized for pioneering work in data integration, schema mapping, and data exchange.

awards.title: VLDB Women in Database Research Award
PVLDB Best Demonstration Award "Interactive Navigation of Open Data Linkages"
Theoretical Computer Science (Journal) 2nd Most Cited Paper 2005-2014

publications.name: A Large Scale Test Corpus for Semantic Table Search
publications.summary: A comprehensive test corpus for semantic table search.
